Detailed Description

This class represents the rightpart (ie right-hand-side) of a production rule.

It it the abstract base class for a family of classes that represent the RHS as an abstract syntax tree.

All RightParts accept a Visitor, which simply calls the specialised visitXXX method for each of the derived classes of RightPart.
